programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 2
programme.desc: Stephanie wonders if Eric is interested in Margo. Storm is furious about Brooke’s attack.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 3
programme.desc: Thorne and Stephanie wonder if Caroline is pregnant. Beth reassures Katie about her complexion.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 4
programme.desc: Bill tells Margo he won’t let Caroline marry Ridge. Dave wants to use Brooke as bait to catch the attackers.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 5
programme.desc: Brooke tells Dave she'll act as a decoy. Stephanie and Eric offer Bill to use their home for the wedding.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 6
programme.desc: Bill pressures Margo to tell him about Ridge. Dave proposes to Brooke but she needs to think it over.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 7
programme.desc: Kristen tells Stephanie she can’t attend the wedding. Donna meets Rocco and convinces him to ask Katie out.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 8
programme.desc: Stephanie suspects there is something going on between Margo and Eric. Rocco arrives for his date with Katie.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 9
programme.desc: Margo tells Ridge he is wrong for Caroline. Caroline convinces Bill to give Ridge a chance.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 10
programme.desc: Eric urges Stephanie to make up with Kristen. Thorne is worried when Ridge leaves to meet Alex.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 11
programme.desc: Bill tells Margo to confess all about her relationship with Ridge or drop the subject.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 12
programme.desc: Brooke tells Storm how much she envies Caroline’s wedding. Alex approaches Ridge again.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 13
programme.desc: Bill is furious when he sees the picture of Ridge and Alex. Bill shows the picture to Margo.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 14
programme.desc: Beth tells Brooke she knew Eric in college. Dave and Brooke have a romantic dinner.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 15
programme.desc: Donna realizes Katie is upset that Rocco hasn’t called her and convinces him to ask her out again.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 16
programme.desc: Ridge tells Thorne about the picture. Donna tells Beth the truth about Rocco’s interest in Katie.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 17
programme.desc: An argument ensues about Kristen’s love life. Storm tries to convince Grandma Logan to move in with family.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 18
programme.desc: Ridge tells Thorne he talked to Bill and hopes Bill won’t tell Caroline about Alex.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 19
programme.desc: Stephanie is upset that Margo is at the wedding. Bill tells Caroline about Ridge and Alex, she is heartbroken.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 20
programme.desc: Caroline is taken to the hospital. The doctor announces she is in shock and needs to be kept overnight.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 21
programme.desc: Brooke acts as a decoy but the plan traps the wrong men. Brooke and Donna decide to go to the hospital.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 22
programme.desc: Eric asks Kristen to stay in town but she refuses. Thorne begs Caroline to give Ridge another chance.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 23
programme.desc: Caroline tells Kristen the wedding is cancelled permanently. Caroline tells Bill she will never forgive him.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 24
programme.desc: Ridge comes to talk to Caroline and is devastated to find her gone. Ridge admits the wedding is cancelled.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 25
programme.desc: Storm and Alex have a date. Dave gives Brooke an engagement ring. Katie and Donna make dinner for Rocco.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 26
programme.desc: Brooke shows her family her engagement ring. Rocco asks Katie about her acne and she is mortified.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 27
programme.desc: Caroline has her purse stolen and asks Kristen for a loan. Stephanie tells Kristen she wants her to stay.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 28
programme.desc: Ridge suspects Kristen was with Caroline, but she lies. Margo confronts Ridge about Caroline.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 29
programme.desc: Donna tries to make Rocco jealous by kissing Mark. Rocco retaliates by kissing Katie while Donna is watching.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 30
programme.desc: Ridge tells Caroline he loves her and will never hurt her again. She tells him she can’t go back to him.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 31
programme.desc: Stephanie tries to convince Kristen to stay in LA. Bill is upset when the police return Caroline’s purse.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 32
programme.desc: Storm is sad that it's been 7 years since his father left. Thorne asks Kristen to tell him where Caroline is.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 33
programme.desc: Grandma Logan tells Beth Steven knew about Beth’s love for Eric. Kristen tells Thorne where Caroline is.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 34
programme.desc: Caroline calls Bill but doesn’t say where she is. Caroline goes job hunting with poor results.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 35
programme.desc: Margo is mad when Ridge changes her design. Ridge threatens to fire Margo if she fed Bill information.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 36
programme.desc: Eric is excited about Kristen coming to work with him. Beth tells Brooke she is catering the Forrester party.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 37
programme.desc: Donna accuses Rocco of lying. Eric asks Margo to the dinner. Caroline still loves Ridge but needs time.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 38
programme.desc: Thorne is upset to hear Caroline accepted Ridge’s ring. Beth tries to get out of the catering job but can’t.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 39
programme.desc: Brooke decides to delay her wedding. Dave is understanding. Storm tells Brooke he thinks Beth and Eric dated.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 40
programme.desc: Storm finds a stack of Beth’s overdue bills. Beth tells her family about the glamorous Forresters.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 41
programme.desc: Bill asks Thorne about Ridge and Caroline. Bill tells Thorne he wishes Caroline had picked Thorne instead.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 42
programme.desc: Stephanie warns Thorne not to get involved with Caroline. Caroline realizes Bill took her ring.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 43
programme.desc: Storm is mad that Brooke’s police protection is ending. Thorne is sad about Ridge and Caroline’s date.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 44
programme.desc: Donna tricks Rocco into looking after Katie. Caroline and Ridge have a romantic dinner.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 45
programme.desc: Beth and Storm become furious when they discover Donna went to the party with Mark.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 46
programme.desc: Mark pushes Donna to move in with him. Margo tells Eric she’s in love with him.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 47
programme.desc: Margo tells Bill about her problem with Eric. Bill encourages Thorne to pursue Caroline.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 48
programme.desc: Storm tells Donna he wants to meet Mark. Eric agrees with Margo that she should resign.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 49
programme.desc: Stephanie asks Ridge if he ever dated Margo. Mark and Donna look at an apartment. Grandma Logan is mugged.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 50
programme.desc: Ridge tells Alex to leave him and his family alone. Alex asks Storm to take a trip with her.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 51
programme.desc: Brooke comforts Donna about Grandma Logan. Grandma Logan wakes up and tells Beth a lie to cover for Donna.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 52
programme.desc: Storm and Beth wonder if Eric recognized her at the party. Ridge asks Thorne why he offered Caroline a job.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 53
programme.desc: The Logans want Grandma Logan to move in but she refuses. Eric is mad that Stephanie knew that Margo resigned.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 54
programme.desc: Storm thinks Mark is a little too slick for Donna. Mark is upset that Donna is having second thoughts.
